hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'manifest.json'; then echo '⛔ manifest.json is security-critical (permissions + CSP). Please confirm this edit is intentional.' >&2; exit 2; fi

FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | python3 -c "import sys,json; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get('file_path',''))" 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.js$' && [ -f "$FILE" ]; then VIOLATIONS=$(grep -nE 'innerHTML|outerHTML|eval\(|new Function\(|onclick=|onload=|onchange=|onsubmit=' "$FILE" 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$VIOLATIONS" ]; then echo "⚠️  CSP violation detected in $FILE:" >&2; echo "$VIOLATIONS" >&2; echo 'Use DOM APIs only: createElement, textContent, addEventListener' >&2; exit 1; fi; fi
